subject: Add job_type_hint and service_category to request category
description: Add two new fields to request_category_config node: 1) job_type_hint (string|null) - select from integration_context.valid_values.job_types. 2) service_category (enum: plumbing, hvac, electrical, appliance, general, null) - categorize service type.
